DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: VASCONCELOS, A. D.;Vasconcelos, Adriano D.;Adriano Dutra de Vasconcelos

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutorado em Engenharia de Transportes na COPPE/UFRJ (2009). Graduao em Engenharia de Fortificaes e Construes e Mestrado em Engenharia de Transportes no Instituto Militar de Engenharia (concluses em 1997 e 2003). Atua principalmente em Projetos e Obras de Engenharia Civil, Otimizao de Transportes e Engenharia Porturia. oficial do Exrcito Brasileiro desde 1997 (atualmente no posto de Coronel).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Doctor in Transportation Engineering from Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (2009). Civil Engineer and Master in Transportation Engineering from Military Institute of Engineering (1997 and 2003). Acting mainly on Construction Projects, Transport Optimization and Port Engineering. Since 1997, he has been a Brazilian Army officer (currently in the rank of Colonel).

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
- A. D. Vasconcelos engenheiro e oficial do Exrcito Brasileiro desde 1997.
- ENGLISH - A. D. Vasconcelos is engineer and oficial of Brazilian Army since 1997

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: O problema de localizao de terminais concentradores e sua aplicao nas redes de transporte intermodal do pas
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Hub location problem and its applications for the intermodal transport networks in Brazil

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: VASCONCELOS, A. D.
Nassi, C. D.
Lopes, L. A. S.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a survey on Combinatorial Optimization and Mathematical Programming dealing with the hub location models most useful to projects of intermodal terminal installation in Brazil. This research was motivated by the latest changes at the legislation on port concession, leasing and installation authorization, as well as by the scenery of government incentive to the use of intermodal transport inside the Country. It approaches the classification of method types, the mathematical formulation models of the problems and their solution techniques.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: The uncapacitated hub location problem in networks under decentralized management

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: VASCONCELOS, A. D.;Vasconcelos, Adriano D.;Adriano Dutra de Vasconcelos
Nassi, Carlos D.
Lopes, Luiz A.S.
